title: Hhampuz
author: Hhampuz
created_time: October 14, 2022, 09:33:39 PMLast edit: January 20, 2023, 11:00:24 PM by Hhampuz
content: Metaspins are entering this space with a splash both in terms of offering an extensive game library (2500+ games) plus their take on leveling up your account in order to receive greater benefits. If you have not done so already I'd recommend you to check it out ASAP! To help spread awareness here on bitcointalk we are also launching this campaign and if you are a quality poster who frequents the gambling boards we want to hire YOU!Rules and Requirements:Wear the Signature and Avatar.Make a minimum of 20 constructive posts each week that you participate in order to get paid.Make a minimum of 10 constructive posts in the gambling sections each week that you participate in order to get paid. These 10 will count towards the 20 post weekly requirement.A maximum of 5 posts per day will be counted towards the weekly requirements.Do not have legitimate negative feedback from a DT-member.If you receive legitimate negative feedback from a DT-member you may be removed from this campaign without payment or notice.Posts in Off-Topic, Games and Rounds, this thread, any campaign/bounty thread as well as places where your signature isn't displayed will not count towards the weekly requirement.You need to have received a minimum of 5 merit in the last 120 days in order to join this campaign.Do not wear any other Signature or avatars during your stay or you will be removed without payment or notice.Do not enroll your main and alt in this campaign or you will be removed and blacklisted from any and all of my campaigns and promotions.Each payment will be sent directly to your bech32 BTC address each Saturday.Each week will run from Saturdays > Fridays with the cut-off being Fridays at 23:59:59 according to my timezone (CET).This campaign will be open for Sr. Members, Hero Members and Legendary Members.Metaspins reserves the right to cancel and/or make changes to this campaign at their own discretion. Each started week will be paid out in full!Payouts and Positions:8x Sr. Members  - $55 in BTC/Week8x Hero/Legendary Members - $70 in BTC/WeekThe comments.body: So, I've noticed that Hero signatures don't look like the image suggests. It should be this, But we get this If the first image was the intended one, the size of the "glow" should be changed in the code.Currently it's like thisCode:[color=transparent][glow=#508,1][size=9pt]Changing it to Code:[color=transparent][glow=#508,1][size=24pt]Makes the center more even.If this was an intentional move, ignore my post. edit: testedhttps://i.imgur.com/dZbt3N0.jpgEdit: It's browser related. Resolved
